name: PolyMerge
description:
Well helloo there jammer!

This is a minimalistic puzzle prototype of using different shapes to reach the end of the level

How to play:

Drag Boxes by holding Left Mouse Button,

Red Boxes erase parts of the environment and

Green Boxes create new terrain when placed insid of eachother

Goal is to get to the end of the level. (Fancy purple portal)

Controls:

Move: 'WASD' or arrow keys

Jump: Space

Reset Level: 'R'

Further explanation is in-game using the tips shown on the bottom right.
